code: import React from'react';import{ArrowUp,ArrowDown}from'react-bootstrap-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatsCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,icon,change,changeType,changeLabel,color='primary',className=''}=_ref;const colorClasses={primary:'border-l-primary-violet',success:'border-l-success',warning:'border-l-warning',error:'border-l-error',info:'border-l-info'};const iconColorClasses={primary:'bg-primary-violet-100 text-primary-violet',success:'bg-green-100 text-green-600',warning:'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-600',error:'bg-red-100 text-red-600',info:'bg-blue-100 text-blue-600'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`stat-card ${colorClasses[color]} ${className}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-title",children:title}),icon&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`stat-icon ${iconColorClasses[color]}`,children:icon})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"stat-value",children:value}),change!==undefined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`stat-change ${changeType==='increase'?'positive':'negative'}`,children:[changeType==='increase'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowUp,{size:12}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowDown,{size:12}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[change,"%"]}),changeLabel&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"ml-1",children:changeLabel})]})]});};export default StatsCard;
